The Killing Fields was truly a superb documentary of a tragic time in the history of mankind. It focuses on the era of the Khmer Rouge and the horrors they imposed on the population of Cambodia. Of course it depicts the death of hundreds of thousands of people but also details how these people are rounded up, whipped into shape and murdered in cold blood. I am always fascinated by this type of history lesson and would recommend this movie to anyone interested in watching the news in a new light.
